item.description:
Don't Be Afraid of the Dark

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Thumbnail | Poster

Starring: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison • Director: Troy Nixey

Description
Sally, a young girl, moves to Rhode Island to live with her father and his new girlfriend in the 19th-century mansion they are restoring. Sally starts to hear voices coming from creatures in the basement.
